abstract: Pres Obama addresses House Democrats at Philadelphia retreat, seeking to inspire them to press forward despite Republican takeover in Congress; lawmakers have been encouraged by Obama's aggressive use of executive authority and ambitious State of the Union goals, despite resurgent power among conservatives; instituting his plans will nonetheless prove a daunting challenge.
lead_paragraph: Democrats have been encouraged in recent weeks by the administration’s aggressive use of executive authority and President Obama’s decision to push a robust progressive agenda in his State of the Union address.

byline.original: By EMMARIE HUETTEMAN and MICHAEL D. SHEAR

snippet: Democrats have been encouraged in recent weeks by the administration’s aggressive use of executive authority and President Obama’s decision to push a robust progressive agenda in his State of the Union address.

headline.main: House Democrats, Facing Long Odds, Take Inspiration From the Top
headline.print_headline: House Democrats, Facing Long Odds, Take Inspiration From the Top
